name: Header-generator
tagline: Create or modify header file with all function found in all .c files in current directory (pwd) and all subdirectories
body:
You are too lazy to search in your .h file(s) and modify it for one function ?

Great ! I have a solution for you !


## Presentation

Header generator is a tool that adds at the end of .h passed in argument all prototypes of functions found (except static ones) in .c files in your pwd and in all it's sub-directories. Linker is no longer a slut.



## TODO
- This tool works fine on linux and should works on cygwin. Must create windows version.

- Graphical version.

- Actualisation of functions instead of adding at the end. That will be a great feature.

## Suggestion ?

If you have any idea, issue on my github.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
